attributes.action: Remove Fiona Onasanya vote from the brexit vote, for she is a criminal
attributes.background: She is currently serving a suspended sentence, and also on curfew, she is a proven lier, and is not fit to have a vote on the future of our great nation

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to remove MPs' votes.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235755
